text:
Hi <@U04SZGSQJF4>
Can you please send me the CSS of variables of how you are setting them so I can get a clear idea of where things are going wrong and assist you accordingly.

You can try:
```background-color: {{ theme.header_accent_color.color }}; color: {{ theme.text_color.color }}; font-family: {{ theme.header_font.font}};```
I was able to figure it out thank you!
